includedAssets.title: Lessons
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy is back and so is Sunnydale High! Dawn enrols for her first day of classes... only to encounter evil spirits living in the basement.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy is back and so is Sunnydale High! Dawn enrols for her first day of classes... only to encounter evil spirits living in the basement.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy is back and so is Sunnydale High! Dawn enrols for her first day of classes... only to encounter evil spirits living in the basement.

includedAssets.title: Beneath You
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy and her friends come to the aid of a woman being pursued by a gigantic worm-like creature.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy and her friends come to the aid of a woman being pursued by a gigantic worm-like creature.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy and her friends come to the aid of a woman being pursued by a gigantic worm-like creature.

includedAssets.title: Same Time, Same Place
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep3 - Same Time, Same Place
includedAssets.synopsis: Willow's return proves rocky. She is unable to see her friends, then discovers a creature that paralyses its victims, then flays them alive.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Willow's return proves rocky. She is unable to see her friends, then discovers a creature that paralyses its victims, then flays them alive.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Willow's return proves rocky. She is unable to see her friends, then discovers a creature that paralyses its victims, then flays them alive.

includedAssets.title: Help
includedAssets.synopsis: On her first day as school counsellor, Buffy meets a girl who is convinced she is about to die and discovers a group of boys planning her sacrifice.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: On her first day as school counsellor, Buffy meets a girl who is convinced she is about to die and discovers a group of boys planning her sacrifice.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: On her first day as school counsellor, Buffy meets a girl who is convinced she is about to die and discovers a group of boys planning her sacrifice.

includedAssets.title: Selfless
includedAssets.synopsis: When Anya summons forth a giant spider demon to kill a large group of fraternity brothers, Buffy realises she must kill Anya before she strikes again.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Anya summons forth a giant spider demon to kill a large group of fraternity brothers, Buffy realises she must kill Anya before she strikes again.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Anya summons forth a giant spider demon to kill a large group of fraternity brothers, Buffy realises she must kill Anya before she strikes again.

includedAssets.title: Him
includedAssets.synopsis: Dawn, Buffy, Anya and even Willow fall hopelessly in love with the school quarterback, while Xander and Spike search for what has bewitched the girls.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Dawn, Buffy, Anya and even Willow fall hopelessly in love with the school quarterback, while Xander and Spike search for what has bewitched the girls.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Dawn, Buffy, Anya and even Willow fall hopelessly in love with the school quarterback, while Xander and Spike search for what has bewitched the girls.

includedAssets.title: Conversations With Dead People
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep7 - Conversations With Dead People
includedAssets.synopsis: The Scoobies face ghosts from the past. Dawn is contacted by her mother and Willow by Tara, while Buffy bonds with an old friend.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Scoobies face ghosts from the past. Dawn is contacted by her mother and Willow by Tara, while Buffy bonds with an old friend.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Scoobies face ghosts from the past. Dawn is contacted by her mother and Willow by Tara, while Buffy bonds with an old friend.

includedAssets.title: Sleeper
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy and her friends fear Spike may be up to his old tricks when a number of people around town mysteriously disappear.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy and her friends fear Spike may be up to his old tricks when a number of people around town mysteriously disappear.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy and her friends fear Spike may be up to his old tricks when a number of people around town mysteriously disappear.

includedAssets.title: Never Leave Me
includedAssets.synopsis: As the First launches an attack against the Watchers' Council, Buffy hopes to learn more about what she's up against by taking Spike prisoner.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the First launches an attack against the Watchers' Council, Buffy hopes to learn more about what she's up against by taking Spike prisoner.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the First launches an attack against the Watchers' Council, Buffy hopes to learn more about what she's up against by taking Spike prisoner.

includedAssets.title: Bring On The Night
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep10 - Bring On The Night
includedAssets.synopsis: Giles returns to Sunnydale with three potential slayers whom Buffy must protect from the First.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Giles returns to Sunnydale with three potential slayers whom Buffy must protect from the First.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Giles returns to Sunnydale with three potential slayers whom Buffy must protect from the First.

includedAssets.title: Showtime
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy teaches the potential slayers a valuable lesson as she faces the Uber-vampire, while Giles and Anya consult a demon about The First.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy teaches the potential slayers a valuable lesson as she faces the Uber-vampire, while Giles and Anya consult a demon about The First.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy teaches the potential slayers a valuable lesson as she faces the Uber-vampire, while Giles and Anya consult a demon about The First.

includedAssets.title: Potential
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy continues tutoring the potential slayers by taking them to a demon bar and a crypt, where she squares up against a vampire.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy continues tutoring the potential slayers by taking them to a demon bar and a crypt, where she squares up against a vampire.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy continues tutoring the potential slayers by taking them to a demon bar and a crypt, where she squares up against a vampire.

includedAssets.title: The Killer In Me
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep13 - The Killer In Me
includedAssets.synopsis: Willow changes into Warren after she and Kennedy kiss, the gang start to suspect that Giles is The First and Buffy faces a choice about Spike.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Willow changes into Warren after she and Kennedy kiss, the gang start to suspect that Giles is The First and Buffy faces a choice about Spike.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Willow changes into Warren after she and Kennedy kiss, the gang start to suspect that Giles is The First and Buffy faces a choice about Spike.

includedAssets.title: The First Date
includedAssets.synopsis: Principal Wood confesses that he is the son of a murdered slayer while on a date with Buffy. Meanwhile, Xander goes on a date he'll never forget.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Principal Wood confesses that he is the son of a murdered slayer while on a date with Buffy. Meanwhile, Xander goes on a date he'll never forget.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Principal Wood confesses that he is the son of a murdered slayer while on a date with Buffy. Meanwhile, Xander goes on a date he'll never forget.

includedAssets.title: Get It Done
includedAssets.synopsis: When shadow puppets open a dimensional portal, Buffy finds herself conversing with the men who created the original Slayer.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When shadow puppets open a dimensional portal, Buffy finds herself conversing with the men who created the original Slayer.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When shadow puppets open a dimensional portal, Buffy finds herself conversing with the men who created the original Slayer.

includedAssets.title: Storyteller
includedAssets.synopsis: As Andrew tapes the Scoobies, they realise he was part of the plan to open the Seal Of Danthalzar and that he is the one who can break the spell.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Andrew tapes the Scoobies, they realise he was part of the plan to open the Seal Of Danthalzar and that he is the one who can break the spell.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Andrew tapes the Scoobies, they realise he was part of the plan to open the Seal Of Danthalzar and that he is the one who can break the spell.

includedAssets.title: Lies My Parents Told Me
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep17 - Lies My Parents Told Me
includedAssets.synopsis: While Spike struggles with his violent past, Giles tries to figure out how The First is controlling him and Willow embarks on a journey.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Spike struggles with his violent past, Giles tries to figure out how The First is controlling him and Willow embarks on a journey.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Spike struggles with his violent past, Giles tries to figure out how The First is controlling him and Willow embarks on a journey.

includedAssets.title: Dirty Girls
includedAssets.synopsis: Faith (Eliza Dushku) shows up in Sunnydale just as mad priest Caleb lures Buffy and the gang to his lair for a devastating battle.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Faith (Eliza Dushku) shows up in Sunnydale just as mad priest Caleb lures Buffy and the gang to his lair for a devastating battle.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Faith (Eliza Dushku) shows up in Sunnydale just as mad priest Caleb lures Buffy and the gang to his lair for a devastating battle.

includedAssets.title: Empty Places
includedAssets.synopsis: Devastated by their defeat, the potentials turn against Buffy and choose a new leader. Meanwhile, Faith struggles against the police.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Devastated by their defeat, the potentials turn against Buffy and choose a new leader. Meanwhile, Faith struggles against the police.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Devastated by their defeat, the potentials turn against Buffy and choose a new leader. Meanwhile, Faith struggles against the police.

includedAssets.title: Touched
includedAssets.synopsis: After interrogating one of the Bringers, Faith and the potential Slayers search for a subterranean arsenal while Buffy confronts Caleb at the vineyard.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After interrogating one of the Bringers, Faith and the potential Slayers look for a subterranean arsenal while Buffy confronts Caleb at the vineyard.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After interrogating one of the Bringers, Faith and the potential Slayers search for a subterranean arsenal while Buffy confronts Caleb at the vineyard.

includedAssets.title: End Of Days
includedAssets.synopsis: Angel returns to Sunnydale to help Buffy in her final fight against Caleb, but first she must win back her leadership of the Potentials from Faith.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Angel returns to Sunnydale to help Buffy in her final fight against Caleb, but first she must win back her leadership of the Potentials from Faith.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Angel returns to Sunnydale to help Buffy in her final fight against Caleb, but first she must win back her leadership of the Potentials from Faith.

includedAssets.title: Chosen
includedAssets.synopsis: The series comes to a staggering climax as Buffy and Angel confront their feelings before the slayer launches a final, devastating assault.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The series comes to a staggering climax as Buffy and Angel confront their feelings before the slayer launches a final, devastating assault.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The series comes to a staggering climax as Buffy and Angel confront their feelings before the slayer launches a final, devastating assault.

includedAssets.title: Season 7
includedAssets.synopsis: Buffy and the Scoobies are aided by a team of potential new Slayers as they try to save the world from evil one last time in this seventh and final season of Joss Whedon's hit fantasy drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Buffy and the Scoobies are aided by a team of potential new Slayers as they try to save the world in this final season of Joss Whedon's fantasy drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Buffy and the Scoobies are aided by a team of potential new Slayers as they try to save the world from evil one last time in this seventh and final season of Joss Whedon's hit fantasy drama.

includedIn.title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer
includedIn.synopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”. Along with her circle of loyal friends, the “Scooby Gang”, Buffy deals with her life as mankind’s defence against the undead.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Teenager Buffy Summers discovers she is destined to battle vampires, demons and other forces of darkness as the latest in a long line of “Slayers”. Along with her circle of loyal friends, the “Scooby Gang”, Buffy deals with her life as mankind’s defence against the undead.

title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer Season 7
synopsis: Buffy and the Scoobies are aided by a team of potential new Slayers as they try to save the world from evil one last time in this seventh and final season of Joss Whedon's hit fantasy drama.
